description.value:
You’re experienced at using ranged weaponry both at a distance and in the thick of a fray. Your ranged attacks no longer suffer disadvantage as a result of targeting a creature that is within 5 feet of you or prone.

Additionally, you can use your minor action to reload a weapon with the Loading property between attacks.

You learn the following Gambit: @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.abilities.L65XCJ63D6V6QUVJ]{Gambit: Shot Across the Bow}
